hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
required_version="5.3.0-1.3"
# Check if reprepro is installed and get its version if dpkg -s reprepro &> /dev/null; then reprepro_version=$(dpkg -s reprepro | grep '^Version:' | awk '{print $2}') else echo "Error: reprepro not found. Please install it first." exit 1 fi
# Compare the installed version with the required version using dpkg --compare-versions if dpkg --compare-versions "$reprepro_version" "ge" "$required_version"; then echo "Reprepro version $reprepro_version is at least $required_version." else echo "Error: reprepro version $reprepro_version is not at least $required_version." exit 1 fi sudo /usr/bin/chown -R jenkins. /srv/repository/unstable/ bash ~/sync-form-other-arch.sh unstable $HOST_S390X s390x bash ~/sync-form-other-arch.sh unstable $HOST_ARM64 arm64 bash /srv/repository/sync-to-llvm.sh unstable
